duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide engineering calculations and pipe system design support based on customer requirements.
Perform thermal movement, anchor load, and other pipe stress analysis calculations.
Assist in pipe support design such as anchors and guides.
Identify and aid in the development of new piping products.
Visit field installations to assist customers in using Victaulic products and optimizing performance.
Provide general support to sales organization including creating, organizing, and conducting internal trainings and customer presentations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Engineering with 2-10 years pipe system design related experience. Professional Engineer (PE) license desired OR Engineer-In-Training (EIT) with the expectation to obtain the PE Certification.
